item.title: Increased Border Security Affecting US Tourism
item.description: Increased security at the U.S. borders appear to be affecting the tourism industry, it was reported.

item.title: Citadel's Ken Griffin: Trump's Tariffs 'Huge Policy Mistake'
item.description: Billionaire investor Ken Griffin said President Donald Trump's latest tariffs are a "huge policy mistake."

item.title: Economist Stephen Moore to Newsmax: 'Never Bet Against Donald J. Trump'
item.description: President Donald Trump's deal-making ability could lead to his tariffs being relatively short-lived, economist Stephen Moore told Newsmax.
